verses.verse: <S%G5293>Let<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%> be subject <S%G5293>to<s%> the <S%G5242>higher<s%> <S%G1849>powers<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> there <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1849%G99999>power<s%> <S%G3361>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: the <S%G1849>powers<s%> that <S%G5607>exist<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5021>ordained<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

Whoever <S%G5620>therefore<s%> <S%G498>resists<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%>, <S%G436>resists<s%> the <S%G1296>ordinance<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> they that <S%G436>resist<s%> shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> to <S%G1438>themselves<s%> <S%G2917>damnation<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G758>rulers<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G5401>terror<s%> <S%G2041>to<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> to the <S%G2556>evil<s%>. Will <S%G2309>you<s%> <S%G1161>then<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> be afraid <S%G5399>of<s%> the <S%G1849>power<s%>? <S%G4160>Do<s%> that which is <S%G18>good<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> you shall <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1868>praise<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G846>same<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G4671>you<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> you <S%G4160>do<s%> that which is <S%G2556>evil<s%>, be <S%G5399>afraid<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G5409>bears<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G3162>sword<s%> in <S%G1500>vain<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2076>is<s%> the <S%G1249>minister<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, a <S%G1558>revenger<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> execute <S%G3709>wrath<s%> upon him that <S%G4238>does<s%> <S%G2556>evil<s%>.

<S%G591>Render<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> their <S%G3782>dues<s%>: <S%G5411>tax<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5411>tax<s%> is <S%G5056>due<s%>; custom to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5056>custom<s%>; <S%G5401>fear<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>; <S%G5092>honor<s%> to <S%G3588>whom<s%> <S%G5092>honor<s%>.

<S%G3784>Owe<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> any <S%G1487>thing<s%>, <S%G3361>but<s%> to <S%G25>love<s%> one <S%G240>another<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> he that <S%G25>loves<s%> <S%G2087>another<s%> has <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3588>this<s%>, You <S%G3431>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> commit <S%G3431>adultery<s%>, You <S%G5407>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5407>kill<s%>, You <S%G2813>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G2813>steal<s%>, You <S%G5576>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> bear false <S%G5576>witness<s%>, You <S%G1937>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1937>covet<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> there be <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1785>commandment<s%>, it is briefly <S%G346>summed<s%> up <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3056>saying<s%>, <S%G1722>namely<s%>, You shall <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> <S%G4139>neighbor<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1438>yourself<s%>.
<S%G26>Love<s%> <S%G2038>works<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G2556>ill<s%> to his <S%G4139>neighbor<s%>: <S%G3767>therefore<s%> <S%G26>love<s%> is the <S%G4138>fulfilling<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5124>that<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> the <S%G2540>time<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2235>now<s%> it is high <S%G5610%G99999>time<s%> to <S%G1453>awake<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5258>sleep<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> is <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1452>nearer<s%> <S%G2228>than<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> we <S%G4100>believed<s%>.

The <S%G3571>night<s%> is far <S%G1161>spent<s%>, the <S%G2250>day<s%> is at <S%G1448>hand<s%>: let <S%G659>us<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%> cast <S%G659>off<s%> the <S%G2041>works<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> let us put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G3696>armor<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%>.

Let us <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G2156>honestly<s%>, <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2250>day<s%>; <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2970>rioting<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3178>drunkenness<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2845>promiscuity<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G766>wantonness<s%>, <S%G3361>not<s%> in <S%G2054>strife<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2205>envying<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> put <S%G1746>on<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G4307>provision<s%> for the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G1519>to<s%> fulfill its <S%G1939>lusts<s%>.
